snippet.title: Hellboy Web of Wyrd - Official Release Date Trailer | gamescom 2023
snippet.description:
"Hellboy Web of Wyrd will be available on Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 5, and Steam on October 4, 2023. Watch the latest trailer to see Hellboy take on fearsome enemies from this roguelite action-adventure game, featuring an original story created in partnership with Dark Horse Comics. 

Featuring monstrous toe-to-toe brawling, you need to chain together hard-hitting melee and ranged attacks to fight a diverse array of increasingly nightmarish enemies. Like the comics, the game sends Hellboy on a series of vastly different and wholly unique adventures. While those stories stand on their own, they are all tied to the mysterious legacy of The Butterfly House."

#IGN #Gaming
